price: 76. Entrez donc par les portes de la Géhenne, où vous resterez pour l’éternité. Combien triste est le séjour des orgueilleux !
arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
